title: Regional Sponsored Migration Scheme (subclasses 119 and 857)
raw_text: ===== main placeholder ========================================== ​This visa is closed to new applications. Regional Sponsored Migration Scheme (subclasses 119 and 857) Page Content The Regional Sponsored Migration Scheme visa (subclasses 119 and 857) closed to new applications on 1 July 2012. If you have applied for this visa but no visa decision has yet been made, you can add dependent children to your application at any time until your visa is decided. If you already hold a Regional Sponsored Migration Scheme visa (subclasses 119 and 857), your family members can apply separately for a visa. They can be in or outside Australia when they apply. This visa allows you and your family to live and work in Australia on a permanent basis. Visa applicant Details Adding family to your application Details You can add the following people to your visa application if you tell us in writing and we have not yet made a decision about your application: your partner your child/step-child or your partner’s child/step-child. For detailed information regarding who you can include in your application see including family members in your application They must also be nominated by your employer. Members of your family unit must be able to show that they meet health and character requirements Visa holders Details How long your visa lasts Details This is a permanent residence visa. What this visa lets you do Details This visa allows you and any family members who have been granted this visa to: stay in Australia indefinitely work and study in Australia enrol in Medicare , Australia's scheme for health-related care and expenses take out private health insurance access certain social security payments apply for Australian citizenship (if you are eligible) sponsor eligible relatives for permanent residence travel to and from Australia for five years from the date the visa is granted (after that time you will need a resident return Your obligations Details Your visa might be cancelled if either: you did not start your employment with the relevant employer within six months of arriving in Australia and you do not satisfy the Minister that you made a genuine effort to start that employment within the six months. you started the employment, but it was terminated within two years of you starting, and you do not satisfy the Minister that you made a genuine effort to be engaged in that employment for the required period. Employer obligations Details The employer must make sure that all relevant workplace laws and award conditions are met. Tell us if things change Details Things you need to let us know about when you have this visa include: changes to your phone number, email, address or passport changes to your relationship status the birth of a child. See how to let us know if there is a change in your situation

===== main placeholder ==========================================

​This visa is closed to new applications.

​This visa is closed to new applications.

​This visa is closed to new applications.

# Regional Sponsored Migration Scheme (subclasses 119 and 857)

Regional Sponsored Migration Scheme (subclasses 119 and 857)
Page Content

​

​

The Regional Sponsored Migration Scheme visa (subclasses 119 and 857) closed to new applications on 1 July 2012.

The Regional Sponsored Migration Scheme visa (subclasses 119 and 857) closed to new applications on 1 July 2012.

If you have applied for this visa but no visa decision has yet been made, you can add dependent children to your application at any time until your visa is decided.

If you have applied for this visa but no visa decision has yet been made, you can add dependent children to your application at any time until your visa is decided.

If you already hold a Regional Sponsored Migration Scheme visa (subclasses 119 and 857), your family members can apply separately for a visa. They can be in or outside Australia when they apply.

If you already hold a Regional Sponsored Migration Scheme visa (subclasses 119 and 857), your family members can apply separately for a visa. They can be in or outside Australia when they apply.

This visa allows you and your family to live and work in Australia on a permanent basis.

This visa allows you and your family to live and work in Australia on a permanent basis.

## Visa applicant

Visa applicant
Details

### Adding family to your application

Adding family to your application
Details

You can add the following people to your visa application if you tell us in writing and we have not yet made a decision about your application:

You can add the following people to your visa application if you tell us in writing and we have not yet made a decision about your application:
- your partner
your partner
- your child/step-child or your partner’s child/step-child.
your child/step-child or your partner’s child/step-child.

For detailed information regarding who you can include in your application seeincluding family members in your application.

For detailed information regarding who you can include in your application see
including family members in your application
.

They must also be nominated by your employer.

They must also be nominated by your employer.

Members of your family unit must be able to show that they meethealthandcharacterrequirements

Members of your family unit must be able to show that they meet
health
and
character
requirements

## Visa holders

Visa holders
Details

### How long your visa lasts

How long your visa lasts
Details

This is a permanent residence visa.

This is a permanent residence visa.

### What this visa lets you do

What this visa lets you do
Details

This visa allows you and any family members who have been granted this visa to:

This visa allows you and any family members who have been granted this visa to:
- stay in Australia indefinitely
stay in Australia indefinitely
- work and study in Australia
work and study in Australia
- enrol inMedicare, Australia's scheme for health-related care and expenses
enrol in
Medicare
, Australia's scheme for health-related care and expenses
- take out private health insurance
take out private health insurance
- access certain social security payments
access certain social security payments
- apply for Australian citizenship (if you are eligible)
apply for Australian citizenship (if you are eligible)
- sponsor eligible relatives for permanent residence
sponsor eligible relatives for permanent residence
- travel to and from Australia for five years from the date the visa is granted (after that time you will need a resident return
travel to and from Australia for five years from the date the visa is granted (after that time you will need a resident return

### Your obligations

Your obligations
Details

Your visa might be cancelled if either:

Your visa might be cancelled if either:
- you did not start your employment with the relevant employer within six months of arriving in Australia and you do not satisfy the Minister that you made a genuine effort to start that employment within the six months.
you did not start your employment with the relevant employer within six months of arriving in Australia and you do not satisfy the Minister that you made a genuine effort to start that employment within the six months.
- you started the employment, but it was terminated within two years of you starting, and you do not satisfy the Minister that you made a genuine effort to be engaged in that employment for the required period.
you started the employment, but it was terminated within two years of you starting, and you do not satisfy the Minister that you made a genuine effort to be engaged in that employment for the required period.

### Employer obligations

Employer obligations
Details

The employer must make sure that all relevant workplace laws and award conditions are met.

The employer must make sure that all relevant workplace laws and award conditions are met.

### Tell us if things change

Tell us if things change
Details

Things you need to let us know about when you have this visa include:

Things you need to let us know about when you have this visa include:
- changes to your phone number, email, address or passport
changes to your phone number, email, address or passport
- changes to your relationship status
changes to your relationship status
- the birth of a child.
the birth of a child.

See how to let us know if there is achange in your situation.

See how to let us know if there is a
change in your situation
.
